name: ADX Trend Pullback
description: Buy pullbacks (RSI < 40) in trending markets (ADX > 20), exit when overbought
rationale: Pullbacks in trending markets offer better risk/reward than breakouts. ADX > 20 confirms a trend exists (not requiring strong trend). RSI < 40 times the entry at moderate pullback. Relaxed thresholds from original (ADX > 25, RSI < 35) for more signals.
